#summary Information on compiling and using with FreeBSD

= Introduction =

ProFUSE has been tested with FreeBSD version 7.1, [http://fuse4bsd.creo.hu/ fuse4bsd], 0.3.9, and FUSE 2.7.3

= Compiling =

The fusefs-kmod and fusefs-libs packages must be installed.

{{{
 make -f makefile.freebsd
}}}

= Usage =

{{{

profuse [options] disk-image mount-folder

}}} 

= Limitations =

See the [http://fuse4bsd.creo.hu/ fuse4bsd] site for more details on the FreeBSD FUSE module.

Fuse For FreeBSD does not currently support extended attributes, so they will not be accessible.
